评论详情: I wore this to a beads trade show because I just wanted to look nice.  This lady selling beads couldn't stop gushing about how much she liked my bracelet. I had already purchased a couple things from her and she was going on and on about my bracelet. Since I had 2 of them I gave her one. We bonded over her demo session making chainmaille bracelet. Okay then I gave my other one to my best friend. I don't own these anymore LOL but I really really enjoyed gifting them away. I might. I might buy them again so I have them in rotation again

评论概述: Nicer than I thought they would be.
评论详情: I bought these for Halloween but I'll wear them all year long. Due to an old injury, one wrist is larger than the other but they were comfortable.
Very attractive, like photo. Very good value. Have very small wrists. Smaller would fit me better.
Great buy and comfortable to wear

评论概述: Broke as soon as I looked at it
评论详情: One bracelet broke before I could even put it on my wrist. They’re also impossible to fix. Very cheaply made.
one of the beads fell off while i was taking it out of the package - so cheap!
I like that two came in one pack. I gave one to my bestie. We both love the bracelet. It's large and eye-catching but also comfortable to wear.
I am very happy with product
